[Version 1.0.15]
[01# Faster Chop Speed]
04000000 00C04648 52800073
[Faster Chop Speed (off)]
04000000 00C04648 2A0103F3
[02# Big Tip]
04000000 00986464 52807CE0
[Big Tip (off)]
04000000 00986464 B9401660
[03# Inf Order Time]
04000000 008BB040 D65F03C0
[Inf Order Time (off)]
04000000 008BB040 FC1A0FE8
[04# Instant Cook]
04000000 0090DD8C 1E259000
[Inf Order Time (off)]
04000000 0090DD8C 1E282800
[05# Stop Timer (Press R stick)]
04000000 008CE970 D503201F
04000000 008F4A74 D503201F
80000020
04000000 008CE970 1E202900
04000000 008F4A74 1E202900
20000000
[06# Faster Washtime]
04000000 00C01060 52800073
[Faster Washtime (off)]
